name: The Gauntlet (Axial Studios)
description:
Help your adventuring party survive waves of enemies in this mini-rogue-like!

Use the dropped items from enemies to craft buffs for your party (or debuffs for your enemies)!

Drag your items into the field manual on the right to see how you can change their effects. Then drag them into the Roaster/Boiler/Masher to change their effects. 

Combine multiple items together to create stronger items!

Survive as long as you can!
